PageTitle: peer update-group-independent (BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view)
FuncDef: The peer update-group-independent command sets each peer in a peer group as an independent update peer-group. The peer update-group-independent enable command sets a specified peer as an independent update peer-group. The peer update-group-independent disable command disables a peer from being set as an independent update peer-group. The undo peer update-group-independent command disables each peer in a peer group from being set as an independent update peer-group. The undo peer update-group-independent enable command disables a peer from being set as an independent update peer-group. The undo peer update-group-independent disable command sets a specified peer as an independent update peer-group. By default, no peer is set as an independent update peer-group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 peer address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
